thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: OPEC, Russia Oil Officials Hint at Extending Production Cuts

author: Benoit Faucon
title: OPEC, Russia Oil Officials Hint at Extending Production Cuts

organizations.name: organization of the petroleum exporting countries

text:
JEDDAH, Saudi Arabia—Key oil officials from OPEC, Russia and other big producers suggested they would keep a tight lid on output through the rest of the year, and maybe into 2019, comments that lifted oil prices temporarily until President Donald Trump weighed in, tweeting oil prices were “artificially very high.”

Brent crude, the global benchmark, moved modestly higher early Friday as oil ministers from Saudi Arabia and other members of the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries, as well as Russia and other producers...
